item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Marco and I study IT in school. Since I was a kid I loved security and privacy and wanted to do something to help the community, and so here I’m with my site where I list the privacy-friendly frontends I host. As you may know, hosting anything online comes with a cost, so if you can and want to help to keep these services online, consider donating. BTC:bc1qvlatym6r84eavdj9ulvdt5rg6kaek3awwskzqd
